column2: [Root.GetFirstName] is lowborn from no distinguished dynasty. You may grant [Root.GetFirstName] the priviledge to form [Root.GetHerHis] own house with [Root.GetHerHis] own Coat of Arms.
Your Official Royal Mistress. She keeps your bed warm when your wife will not perform her duties. Her position also comes with a bit of power
You may order your men to have [Root.GetFirstName]'s eye removed as punishment for [Root.GetHerHis] crimes.
As a ruler, you may order your men to remove [Root.GetFirstName]'s dominant hand as a punishment.

Your men drag [From.GetFirstName] to the courtyard, kicking and screaming as they went along. Of course, [From.GetBestName] begged for mercy by the grace of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] as you announced that you would be blinding [From.GetHerHim], but the decision is yours to make.
I've decided to spare you today.

Your men drag [From.GetFirstName] to the courtyard, kicking and screaming as they went along. Of course, [From.GetBestName] begged for mercy by the grace of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] as you announced that you would be cutting on of [From.GetHerHis] hands off, but the decision is yours to make.
Be glad it's not your head.
[This.GetTitledFirstName]'s religion believes in leaders being chosen by election
